response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with an exceptional opportunity to acquire a product that holds immense value to both of us. This unique offering is worth $1,000,000 to you, and I am extending this chance to purchase it at a special price. My offer to you is $950,000. This is a generous discount, allowing you to secure this valuable asset at a highly favorable rate. I trust that you will find this proposal compelling and look forward to your positive response.", "product_price": 950000}
